translatedText: Forse la formula più importante in probabilità.
input: Perhaps the most important formula in probability.

translatedText: Aiuta a finanziare progetti futuri: https://www.patreon.com/3blue1brown
Una forma di supporto altrettanto preziosa è semplicemente condividere alcuni video.
input: An equally valuable form of support is to simply share some of the videos.

translatedText: Un ringraziamento speciale a questi sostenitori: http://3b1b.co/bayes-thanks
input: Special thanks to these supporters: http://3b1b.co/bayes-thanks
Interactive made by Reddit user Thoggalluth: https://nskobelevs.github.io/p5js/BayesTheorem/

translatedText: Puoi leggere di più sul lavoro di Kahneman e Tversky in Thinking Fast and Slow, o in uno dei miei libri preferiti, The Undoing Project.
input: You can read more about Kahneman and Tversky's work in Thinking Fast and Slow, or in one of my favorite books, The Undoing Project.
